tool_description: CoinMarketCal is the most trusted crypto events database in the industry. Implement our API for free.
name: CoinMarketCal
title: CoinMarketCal

api_list.name: /coins
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coinmarketcal.p.rapidapi.com/coins"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coinmarketcal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /events
api_list.description:
Multiple fields (Coins and Categories) can be provided with comma separated ID string. (eg Coins: bitcoin,ethereum | eg Categories: 1,2).

**It’s not possible to retrieve events before 25/11/2017.
Please, do not forget to use can_occur_before field in the response object, this field is very important as some events can occur before the date stated.**

optional_parameters.name: dateRangeEnd
optional_parameters.description: End date (default value is date of furthest event) (format like 2017-11-25)

optional_parameters.name: coins
optional_parameters.description: Coins ID - Multiple field - See [GET] /api/coins for the entire list of available coins ID

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description: Categories ID - Multiple field - See [GET] /api/categories for the entire list of available categories ID

optional_parameters.name: max
optional_parameters.description: Maximum amount of events to display per page

optional_parameters.name: dateRangeStart
optional_parameters.description: Start date (default value is today) (format like 2017-11-25)
